summary: Adds a bathroom to Hjerim in Windhelm. There is no load doors. Also it changes children's room area a little bit, so it's compatible with Hearthfires and it requires it. Look at images for more information.
descriptionHtml:
MOD DESCRIPTION:

This mod is a Bathroom add-on for Hjerim in Windhelm. It adds a bath area to the top floor. It uses Hjerim's own cell, so there is no load doors. Also it changes children's room area a little bit for compatibility with Heartfires. So it works fine with Heartfires and it requires it. Look at images for more information. I made this a long time ago, and I've just found it in a mysterious place in my computer, so there will be no updates. Besides, no updates are necessary, I'm using it with my 70 other mods and it's fine.


REQUIREMENTS:

The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
Heartfires DLC



COMPATIBILITY:

It's not compatible with anything that chages areas I've changed. Mods that changes other areas in Hjerim should be compatible with this one.
author: termokingtr
